node.html: My first ride with my new BMC Teammachine, definitely felt the difference in speed between this bike and my commuter.
This was my first ever hawk hill ascent with the boys, extremely difficult but totally worth it.
Nothing special about this run in particular but I hit 1000 all time miles in the middle of the run!
This run holds both my 10k and 5k PR, I have yet to recreate this.
My first half marathon race and my current half marathon PR, this race felt amazing the whole time and my pacing was on point.
This was my first continuous run which broke 20 miles and my longest ever run so far.
This was my first ever continuous 10k and at this point was the longest distance I had ever run continuously.
This was my first half marathon ever, my legs were absolutely trashed and I took a bunch of breaks, but it felt great nonetheless.
My first ever race! This started as a bet between my roommates in Florida and training for this race was what got me into running.
